location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 56 to Captain Joseph Alderson, Commander of the Panther,from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter that commands Alderson to sail to Bombay to deliver a packet to the Council there and then take his orders from it.The item level description of Letter No. 57 (item IOR/R/15/1/3, pp 118-119) that follows this item has been omitted and is added at the end of the item level listing for this file.
